kiyanawane...oyita wada kochchara dewal nam wunada pahugiya tike...hi hi.2011 chawuwa wela giyata onna 2012 janawari 1 honda wadakata atha gahala thamayi patangaththe....wawula kaleka indan irida udeta daham pasal yanawane.igena ganna ehema neweyi onna.api ithin nisi kalata daham danuma labalane inne..;)..yaluwekge illimatama ithin mama daham pasale ugannanna giya iridata ee hati wadak thibuneth nathi hinda.eda ude pansale podi hamuduruwo(podi hamuduruwaru kipa namak wada innawa,eyin eka hamuduru namak) pansil dila iwarawela aluth awurudda gana podi anushasanawak kala.daham pasala ganath,guruwarunge wadakotasa agayaminuth anushasana kala hamuduruwange eka kathawak mata hondatama oluwata waduna.unwahanse wadale mehemayi...."thanakola agissakin apita kate indul ayin karanna puluwan,kana suddha karanna puluwan.kisima watinakamak nathi,wadagathkamak nathi thanakola gahakin ehema wadak karanna puluwan nam mechchara usas sathwayek wechcha manussayata karanna bari monawada?..."aththatama apita karanna bari deyak thiyanawada?...athapaya wehesala tikak mahansi wunoth apita lokema hollanna puluwan....ba ba kiya kiya kammali kamen mukuth nokara gewalwalata wela inna aya ki denek nam lankawe innawa athda?...ee kiwuwamayi mathak wune...onna ithin aluth panthi walata lamayi wenkarala iwarawunata passe mage panthiyata lamayi 4 denek awith wadiwela innawa.mama gihin ahuwa lamayekgen mehema,"kattiya mechcharada inne?"..."ow sar" kiyala uththarayakuth labuna.mama kokatath eha panthiyatath poddak oluwa dala baluwa waradila ee panthiyata giya aya innawada kiyala.eeth na.mage athata eetapasse labuna panthiyata pahala shreniyen enna niyamitha lamayige nam layisthuwak.eeke hitapu 36 denekgen janawari 1 wenida awith thibune 4 denayi...onna ookayi thathwe ada lankawe.1 wenidama kammalikamata gedarata wela hitapu podi ewuwo 32 gana hithuwama issara ape ammala api podi kale kiwuwa kawiyak mathakwuna mata..."kammali kollanepolkatuwa gena athinepalayawu hingamanethopata natha wena wadak ithine"pahugiya awurudda kammali kamin gewadapu aya poddak hiri arala pranawath wenna.ba kiwuwoth hamadama ba thamayi.me aluth awurudde aluthin patan ganna jiwithaya.thawamath parakku na.wenas wenawa nam...jiwithaya wenas karaganna uwamana nam hondatama kal thiyanawa.adin patanganna wenaswenna.thamunge watinakama andunagena ee anuwa wada karanna.thanakola gahakin achchara dewal karanna puluwan nam manussayage chinthana shakthiya yodawala karanna puluwan wada kotasa harima wishalayi.
